[Home](./index.md) &gt; [vm-providers](./vm-providers.md) &gt; [VMConfig](./vm-providers.vmconfig.md)

## VMConfig interface

Configuration that can be passed to [createVM](./vm-providers.createvm.md) when cloning and starting a virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VMConfig<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id?](./vm-providers.vmconfig.id.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Id of the new virtual machine. If not provided, an automatically-generated UUID is used. |
|  [log?](./vm-providers.vmconfig.log.md) | [LogFunction](./vm-providers.logfunction.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Log function. |
|  [redirectTCPPorts?](./vm-providers.vmconfig.redirecttcpports.md) | number\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> List of TCP port numbers in the virtual machine that should be accessible from the host. For each redirection requested in this array, a [PortRedirection](./vm-providers.portredirection.md) object will be available in the [VM.tcpRedirections](./vm-providers.vm.tcpredirections.md) array. |
|  [vmSettings](./vm-providers.vmconfig.vmsettings.md) | T | Defines the provider and the settings for the virtual machine, as available for each provider. |
